duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee the Customer Technical Services (CTS) Program Integration team and support all PW partnership programs
Identify and escalate information pertinent for making strategic decisions
Collaborate closely with Engineering and Program to reach alignment with key issues
Manage resource allocation within the team, perform contract reviews, and monitor budgets
Provide supervision, approval of employee charging, and resolve issues brought forth by team members
Establish group cohesion, ensure all tools for daily operation are available, and conduct regular 1:1's with group members
Promote collaboration between MTU Program, Partners, and PFSE in Munich and provide direction and assign tasks to the CTS Groups
Support the advancement of the Group’s technical competencies and assist in recruiting, interviewing, training, and long-term departmental planning

education_certification.credential: 10+ years of relevant experience in gas turbine engine MRO preferred
2+ years of demonstrated experience in a cross functional leadership role preferred
